original_text: With men hidden in the room, she called to him, “Samson, the Philistines are upon you!” But he snapped the bowstrings as easily as a piece of string snaps when it comes close to a flame. So the secret of his strength was not discovered.
korean_text: 이미 사람을 방 안에 매복시켰으므로 삼손에게 말하되 삼손이여 블레셋 사람들이 당신에게 들이닥쳤느니라 하니 삼손이 그 줄들을 끊기를 불탄 삼실을 끊음 같이 하였고 그의 힘의 근원은 알아내지 못하니라

sentences.original_text: With men hidden in the room
Samson, the Philistines are upon you!
sentences.korean_translation: 삼손, 블레셋 사람들이 너에게 달려들고 있단다!

sentences.original_text: as easily as a piece of string snaps
when it comes close to a flame
So the secret of his strength
